channel.title: Downloads section: Czar-based = spam?
channel.description:
Personally, I think there should be a new rule in the downloads section:
If your server is Czar based [b]AND[/b] you haven't removed at least 5K lines from it. [b]DON'T POST[/b]
I also have other views.
E.g everything in downloads section should be deleted and future posts should be examined by mods first. By deleted I mean moved to say an archives or some shizz. If they can't be examined by mods first I reckon there should be either a post amount or rep amount needed to post a [b]server[/b].
If none of these can be achieved simply locking servers with incorrect credits, next to no adjustments or with more thank 20K lines in one file (E.g badly coded) will suffice for a time.
Don't even get me started about what handlers should be neccassary before a server is allowed to be released.

item.title: Downloads section: Czar-based = spam?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Yeah. Devo 2.7 is good. So wL shouldnt be banned. But Czar is a crappy 317. Delta aint that good too. Im not saying to ban the 317’s but I’m saying what I hate.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloads section: Czar-based = spam?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

I myself have recently made Tasahm-scape which was my attempt at this. Everyone seems to like the things from Reapage-scape etc. So I made a Devolution 2.4 (Unpackaged) based server which had all the features of a Czar (Like the skilling area etc). I didn’t copy and paste these, except the objects (Which I loaded the correct way), I wrote them out using a void and switch statements which is the correct way. My hope was is that some noobs would download it and go ‘you can code without using 20 lines an object?’ WOW!

Result:
Flamed.
Pushed to bottom of downloads section.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2009, 01:34:40 pm[/size][hr][quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:296433"][quote author=Tatemo link=topic=392435.msg2921699#msg2921699 date=1250796520]
I don’t think banning wL is really any good at all. wL is the easiest to learn on and has the most features so far.

i have an idea

ban all wL based servers

No, ban all delta based servers.

theres nothing wrong with wL if you use it properly.

The problem there is. The only reason we wanna get rid of delta is we have seen too much of it. Delta isn’t coded all that badly like Czar based ones so we don’t have any proper grounds to get rid of it.

I do think we should glorify servers like Devo more though they are really nice.

Servers like iClarity and Devolution should be stickied.

Here’s another idea:

Split the downloads section into two sections:
One for everyday trash with Czar banned.
The other for seriously good bases like Devo iClarity and non-winterlove things.

Newty, we try but all the tutorials are for Czar now. So all the noobs just think its easier. (On other sites its the same)
[/quote]

I also disagree with devolution and Iclarity being stickied.
They are nothing compared to the stuck frameworks.[/quote]

They have features. The stuck frameworks are completely useless to people who have no idea how to code. They are never going to be used by them. Unless someone who knows how to do it (Unlike me) goes and adds some decent features to them they are just gonna sit there only being used by the people who are really good at this.

Read full topic

item.description:

I have an idea, lead by example. IE, you don’t like Czar, release a stable base that rivals Czar in features. Other members might follow your example.
